object.creator: 开发者
object.name: vIB_XYZZSPLC_GS
object.package: 101_固收.1_发行前.T-协议终止审批流程
object.describe: 协议终止审批流程.终止审核/终止协议流程（流经协同平台）

column.name: XMZYWT
column.comment: 如为监管审核或立项内核被否，请详细说明项目主要问题。

column.name: XMCZQSRQ
column.comment: 项目承做起始日期要早于立项日期

column.name: SFTGLX
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT CASE WHEN T.BJJG IN ('1', '2') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM ecif.LCIB_GS_LXLC T WHERE T.XMMC = ?",[XMMC])

column.name: SFTGNH
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT CASE WHEN T.BJJG IN ('1', '2') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM ecif.LCIB_GS_NHLC T WHERE T.XMMC = ?",[XMMC])

column.name: NHBZS
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select t1.NHZY_ZS from ECIF.lcIB_GS_NHLC t1 inner join jgcrm.os_wfentry t2 on t2.id=t1.instid where t2.state=4 and t1.XMMC=? and rownum = 1 order by t1.instid desc",[XMMC])

column.name: JGTS
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
客户单位是否持有“武器装备科研生产保密资格证书”、“武器装备科研生产许可证书”、“武器装备质量管理体系证书”、“装备承制单位资格证书”四证之一'

column.name: OASPXX
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_XYZZSPLC_GS' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/oAsuggestion.sdo?oaWorkId="+oaid+"&lcbd=lcIB_XYZZSPLC_GS&lcbdId="+ID;
"<iframe id='lc_oayj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_GS_CXXYSP' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
oaid<=0
